      • testContinentChecks

        public void testContinentChecks()
                         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                CannotFindException,
                                DuplicatesException
        Test of continentChecks method, of class Validate.
        抛出:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - exception thrown when file does not exist
        DuplicatesException - exception thrown when duplicate country in continent
        CannotFindException - exception thrown when input file is different standard file format
